column17:
Product Description

Nourishing Amla Hibiscus Fenugreek hair oil nourishes the roots helps control dandruff and hairfall prevents split ends and dryness. Enriched with the natural goodness of : Amla with natural Vitamin C and natural proteins which promotes hair growth Hibiscus which conditions the hair and reduces hair fall Fenugreek which is a very effective antidandruff agent all steeped in a base of Coconut and castor oil to nourish the scalp and prevent dryness and loss of hair.
